review: Got this for my parents. It was a bit tricky to setup and not as intuitive as an Apple TV.  But for the price it's well worth it.  They run Netflix off of it and that's it.  It works perfectly for that.  I only wish my moms kindle fire would stream to it.
author: J. Wiersema

review: This device has not worked since day one. Unfortunately I delayed setting the Chromecast up and was not able to return it to Amazon. After numerous calls to Google it was determined that the device could be faulty and was given instructions to return it for a replacement. However, the instructions came via email and allowed only 24 hours to respond, and you guessed it, I didn't see the email until that time had expired. Also, Google insisted that I open a Google wallet account that they would charge the replacement device to. That charge would be removed if they deemed the returned device to be faulty. Sounds like a good way to end up paying for two devices and only having one. Obviously, would not recommend anyone buy the Chromecast and to avoid doing business with Google or their products.
author: Kenneth D.
